p: Green alga Codium bursa (Olivi) C. Agardh was collected from the middle part of the Adriatic Sea at Iški Mrtovnjak island, in May 2018 (44°00′36″ N; 15°10′36″ E). The alga was collected from a depth of 10 to 15 m and the sea water was collected from the same depth (directly into the plastic bag where the collected alga was placed). The alga which was placed in an airtight plastic bag containing surrounding seawater was immediately transported to the laboratory.
